oai_dc:dc.dc:title: UHR's Termbase for Norwegian higher education institutions
UHRs termbase for universitets- og høgskolesektoren
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lexical Conceptual Resource
Text
Terminological Resource
English
Norwegian
oai_dc:dc.dc:description:
This is a collection of 2000 administrative terms with English - Norwegian bokmål/Norwegian bokmål - English and English - Norwegian nynorsk/Norwegian nynorsk - English translations, from the Norwegian Institutions of Higher Education (UHR). The termbase translates from Norwegian bokmål/Norwegian nynorsk to British English and the other way around.
The term base is owned by the Norwegian Association of Higher Education Institutions (UHR) in Oslo (cf. web page: http://www.uhr.no/ressurser/temasider/terminologi). The term base has been made downloadable in TBX format by the META-NORD group at University of Bergen, with the kind permission of UHR. META-NORD has also assisted UHR in providing a license for the downloadable version as well as for the online, browsable version.
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: The Norwegian Association of Higher Education Institutions
